steps.title: Steps
text_values: Click the [Authenticate with Twitch] button below.
When the Twitch login page appears, log in with the account you want to use for the bot.
If the login page doesn't appear and a different user is shown, log out from the Twitch website first.
If the displayed user is correct, click Authorize.
Once the process is complete, you will be redirected back to this page. Copy the access_token value.
Open your app's config.json file and set the twitch.accessToken.

revoke_access.title: Revoke Access
revoke_access.explanation: Revoke a token that is no longer in use.
